attributes.action: Prime Minister to make a bold statement that NO further banks will be nationalised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the great message delivered by the PM and the Chancellor today of how further to help the banks to start lending, it was a shock that a few brokers caused wide spread panic by telling share holders to cut their losses and run, that there is a danger that major banks will be nationalised. I urge the PM/Chancellor to make a statemnt ASAP that this will not happen to put the confidence back in our financial system.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
